Rating_Title: The Tata Yodha Is A Poeerful Vehicle
Reviews_Description: The Tata Yodha is a powerful vehicle in the segment. It is good for loading heavy items. Because it is giving you a good performance and value for money.
Tata Yodha is so easy and fun to drive, it's so convenient, spacious, and great for off-roading.

Rating_Title: Biggest Mistake By Purchasing The Tata Yodhayodha
Reviews_Description: This vehicle is used less new one also face the problem of oil leakage, auto sterling and failure of clutch plates within 6month of purchase over. The vehicle is under breakdown condition for 6+10 days even for minor problems
I like this pickup and one of my favourite vehicle.
